title.narrative: CSR-facility: Fashion Links - Access to Sustainable Production

description.narrative:
The main objective is to create incentives for sustainable production for the Danish fashion industry while achieving a positive effect on the development work in the production countries.
The project milestones are: 1. Create a greater awareness about sustainability in the Dansh fashion industry, particularly how to implement responsible supply chain management.
2. Develop a database that specifically caters for sustainable production in certain developing countries, thereby making it easier for the Danish fashion industry to identify production partners with a sustainable focus.
3. Facilitate direct contact between Danish fashion brands and potential production partners with a sustainable profile in developing countries by arranging speed-dating events in Copenhagen.
